description: When your Armour is fully depleted, you take 25% less Health Damage for 10 seconds
When you Block a Ranged Attack, enemies within a 10-metre radius take the Damage instead
A perfectly timed Parry or Block creates a Shock area for 5 seconds. Cooldown is 30 seconds.
Every 30 seconds, all Squad Members automatically restore 1 Armour Segment
The banner deals Damage that scales with difficulty over time to enemies within its area of effect
Shield Bash deals 200% more Damage. Thunder Hammer Pommel Smash deals 100% more damage and deals area-of-effect Damage within a 7 meter radius. Cooldown is 5 seconds.
When the banner is activated, it revives Incapacitated Squad Members within its area of effect
When your Armour is depleted, a reserve Shock Grenade automatically detonated at your position. Cooldown is 90 seconds.
A perfectly timed Parry deals area-of-effect Damage that scales with difficulty within a 5-metre radius.
Enemies in a Shock area take 25% more Damage
When your Health is less than 50%, you take 30% less Health Damage
Contested Health fades 50% more slowly for all Squad Members
The banner restores Armour 300% faster, but its Duration is reduced to 10 seconds
All Squad Members within the banner's area of effect take 20% less Damage, and the banner lasts 20% longer
After a Shield Bash or Thunder Hammer Pommel Smash, Melee Damage increases by 15%, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back for 10 seconds
A perfectly timed Parry instantly Incapacitates a Majoris- or Extremis-level enemy. Cooldown is 90 seconds.
After a Shield Bash or Thunder Hammer Pommel Smash, Melee Damage increases by 30% for 10 seconds
If you are surrounded by 5 or more enemies, you take 25% less Damage from Ranged Attacks
Non-Finisher Gun Strikes restore 1 Armour Segment
All Squad members take 20% less Health Damage from Extremis- and Terminus-level enemies
Shield Bash knocks enemies back and makes them lose control for a longer period of time
When the banner is activated, all Squad Members regain maximum Contested Health, but it recharges 50% slower
All Squad Members within the banner's area of effect deal 20% more Damage
If you have Armour remaining, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back
